item.description:
Hi All,

Now that alot of us got to meet each other, I am setting up a Dance/Rock band night. I am scheduling the night at the StoneBridge in Milford. They are having a Local 70's to top 40 band there. This band is awsome. The band name is Timeless. They are one of the best bands in this area by far. StoneBridge is in Milford, right near a beautiful stream. Click on this MAP to get Google directions. They will most likely be throwing out their T-Shirts. I hope you catch one.

This is going to be a blood pumping night, so, I would like to invite everyone. This band is really good to just watch, or dance to.

$2 nominal fee raffle goes towards the bands T-SHIRT. For those of you who want to go at 8:00 for dinner, here is the menu. The band will start at 10:00.

The type of dress for this one is: Shirt and Dress Pants or a Dress for the ladies. No sneakers please. And a quote from the 80's, "REMEMBER, DRESS TO IMPRESS!!"

Steve C.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: StoneBridge Wild Dance Party Live Awsome Band
